01/05/2023 11 00 pst on > top of page 3 it should be work a > total of 37 row instead of 49 row the sock socks pattern is a modification to my basic sock pattern no frills toe up socks 2 the colourwork pattern is adapted from a stitch pattern from the knitovation stitch dictionary by andrea rangel 3 the download includes the colourwork chart and the modifications done to the basic sock pattern however feel free to use the chart on any other toe-up sock pattern that you are comfortable with you may also read the chart reversely and knit the sock cuff-down any basic sock pattern with 64 stitches on the foot and leg would work please make these socks however you like to showcase your love for sock-knitting **sizes** eu shoe sizes 37-38 / us women s shoe sizes 6½-7½ but is easily adaptable tips for adjusting sizes not tested * for size 35-36/us 5-6 decrease needle sizes by 0 25 mm * for size 39-41/us 8-9½ increase needle sizes by 0 25 mm * for sizes 42/us 10½ and above decrease needle sizes by 0 25 mm and add one pattern repeat width-wise and add 1 row of socks on the foot **suggested needles** 2 25 mm us 1 or 2 75 mm us 2 circular needles with a 80 cm 32 inches or longer cord using the magic loop method **gauge** in colourwork stockinette stitch 31 sts * 36 row = 10 cm 4 inches square on 2 75 mm us 2 needles **yarn** sandnes garn sisu 80% wool 20 % nylon 50 g/
